title: [ W A N T E D } - ADC to duo with SUPP

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Folks,

Old fart here.  I am wanting to join up with a team or duo with an ADC to jump up though the ranks!  Lets see how high we can climb!  I don't muck around and get on with game for the win.

Please invite me if you are solid yourself - Regards Krull1973

KRULL1973

replies.body: Hi Krull, am keen to find someone to play with in season 7. New to LOL and still lots to learn. Old fart as well. Add me if you what to have a few games !! Cheers JohnoKiwi
